house_listing.house_description: This may be your last chance to buy waterfront/wooded lots in little neck! New const. On 18 1/4 acre to over 1 acre lots. Model home available. Awesome, highly desirable view and water access! Natural settings. 1 & 2 car gar, some w/1st floor master br. Map 223 e-4. Model 2900
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Colonial Style, Foyer, Utility Room, Walk-InCloset(s)
